website_summaries.verdict: A practical an inexpensive pie pan with simple, clean lines, plus you get 3 for the price.
pros: Price is a good value for a 3-pack of pie pans
These pans are lightweight and have a classic look
A lot of people find themselves using these pie pans for everyday eating and serving
cons: The depth on these pans is only about 1.5" which makes a shallower pie

customer_reviews.title: I am making a sausage quiche for Easter and the ...
customer_reviews.text: I am making a sausage quiche for Easter and the plate just cracked off - two pieces while in the oven.. So WHAT is up with that ??? It says oven safe. I will contact Amazon to see what they can tell me - I ordered two of these pie plates and now I'm not sure what to do with the second one... if you can't put them in the oven, what does someone do with these ??????
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia P.

customer_reviews.title: Love all things Corelle
customer_reviews.text: I was very impressed with these Corelle Livingware pie plates. I love the fact that they are lightweight and maintenance free. They are easy to wash and always look brand new even after years of use. I've replaced all my dinnerware with Corelle Livingware. They stack easily in my kitchen cabinet and I am happy to add these pie plates to my collection. Now, if you would only bring back your white grab it bowls again in this Corelle vitrine rather than stoneware.
customer_reviews.author: Mother Crone

customer_reviews.title: Love these. So many uses.
customer_reviews.text: These plates are great! We use them for so many things like serving a big salad that has meat that you have to cut—so much easier than using a rounded bowl. Also makes a good serving plate for baked potatoes. Also they’re great for creating a breading station—eggs, flour, breadcrumbs—because they’re big enough to place large cutlets in. SO MANY USES.
customer_reviews.author: L. Elmendorf

customer_reviews.title: Fantatic dishes!
customer_reviews.text: Love these! They are the best - dinner bowls - ever! We use them for dishes that have a lot of sauce, like spaghetti, where a regular plate is just too flat. I have a set of eight and they are the most used dishes in the house. Great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Funny Nacho

customer_reviews.title: received in a timely manner and was well wrapped best dishes ever
customer_reviews.text: these dish make the best dinner plates as we are older here and food cant slip off these plates they can be used to bake pies and a number of things love them ive had them before but they seemed to left my house so these will be well watched
customer_reviews.author: Linda J. Skaggs

customer_reviews.title: Great for family shared meals
customer_reviews.text: We use these plates for "family style" shared meals. Previously we used some glass pie plates from the 90s. They were on the heavy side and overtime had its nicks. Sadly it was time to replace them. Pros: wide, high side walls, light weight and so easy to clean. Corelle - Thanks and keep on making great products!
customer_reviews.author: Erik

customer_reviews.title: Great for Microwave Scrambled Eggs and sloppy meals
customer_reviews.text: Used mostly for making scrambled eggs mixed with pre cooked rice or noodles. Also Fried mac and cheese or sloppy joes in the microwave. I've never made or baked a pie in my life.
customer_reviews.author: Kona Mike

customer_reviews.title: Corelle deep dish pie plate
customer_reviews.text: I bought these pie plates with the intention of using them on the deck for grilled foods and for outdoor meals. I have even dropped the empty pie plate without any damage, yet they are lightweight. I like the simple white color and the clean-up is a breeze. I will eventually purchase several more to use as casual dinner plates for outside use as well as inside use as a replacement to my regular dinner plates. I like that I can use them in the oven or microwave, too. I just can't say enough good things about these pie plates! Oh yeah, the cost is comparable to regular dinner plates.
customer_reviews.author: online shopper

customer_reviews.title: Corelle Pie Plates Are Excellent!
customer_reviews.text: I already had two of these and purchased three more, two for a gift. They're ideal for leftovers and standard microwave covers fit them perfectly. Love them for warming up leftovers, because the depth of the dish avoids spillage. They're also perfect for anything with juice or sauce (spaghetti & meatballs, meatload w/gravy, beef stew, etc.)
customer_reviews.author: HyeAghcheg

customer_reviews.title: Perfect plate!
customer_reviews.text: We love these corelle pie plates in our house! We use them for everyday plates. They are great for warming leftovers in the microwave as the microwave cover sits perfectly on the rim. The durability can't be beat!
customer_reviews.author: J. Boquet

customer_reviews.title: Hard to find, worth the wait
customer_reviews.text: We've been using these as dinner plates for years. I broke three last year while camping and looked...and looked...and looked for new ones. Took some effort, but now the cupboard is full again. Great price and great service.
customer_reviews.author: David Penny

customer_reviews.title: Very useful plate/bowl. I was happy to see this configuration ...
customer_reviews.text: Very useful plate/bowl. I was happy to see this configuration and have used it for many, many different applications. We are older and weight of all dishes, pots, etc have become a very important issue in our home. Love the Corelle for many reasons. Freezer, microwave, dishwasher safe and the weight is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: acctgmgr

customer_reviews.title: I've had a few these for awhile and my husband ...
customer_reviews.text: I've had a few these for awhile and my husband and I both grab them when making our dinner plates. Decided I needed a couple more. Makes for safe "lap" eating while watching television.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: hot meals
customer_reviews.text: great for cold winter nights, chili, stew, homemade goulash, and lets not forget biscuits & country gravy.
customer_reviews.author: amethos

customer_reviews.title: Hard to find
customer_reviews.text: We bought these at Walmart years ago. Great everyday plate! Has depth for stew and pasta. No spill!
customer_reviews.author: T W

customer_reviews.title: Durable
customer_reviews.text: Love correlle dishes stack small and durable. Box arrived with a hole which concerned me but dishes were ok
customer_reviews.author: Jkar

customer_reviews.title: Very Versatile!
customer_reviews.text: Have owned two of these plates for many years. There was no label on them when purchased (open stock {...mart}) so I did not know they were a "pie plate". They just seemed very usable. And they certainly have been - pasta, stew, salad,etc., good for almost anything. Since there is just the two of us, and we very seldom eat at the dining room table, they are great. Just purchased two more :)
customer_reviews.author: Enna

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: Great for serving platers too. Very light and easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Frances

customer_reviews.title: this order cannot be served
customer_reviews.text: I received the package just fine, put them in the dishwasher and one plate broke in half. I would like a replacement plate. maybe someone is listening now?
customer_reviews.author: Dianne Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Chips easily
customer_reviews.text: We use these for everything but pies because they are shallow, but they are also light, stackable, easily cleaned and handy for many things. One disappointment was one rim has a large chip although these have not been handled roughly. I thought about getting a replacement but the price has doubled from one that already seemed a bit high.
customer_reviews.author: Jknox

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product from Corning
customer_reviews.text: We've been looking for these high and low for a long time. Finally found this on Amazon. Excellent product from Corning. Our original ones have lasted well over 20+ years with hardly any signs of wear.
customer_reviews.author: Hot in Houston

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These not only are great for pies, but they make great spaghetti plates, and easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Nana Gardens 2

customer_reviews.title: So happy I bought them
customer_reviews.text: I was sold on these by others' reviews. These really are a must have for fancy couch potato dining!!! So happy I bought them!
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Brown

customer_reviews.title: Love 'Em!
customer_reviews.text: I use these "plates" for all kinds of things, not just pasta. They're light - those heavy plates aren't user friendly like these.
customer_reviews.author: toby111

customer_reviews.title: This is perfect. It seems a bit shallow to be a ...
customer_reviews.text: I didn't actually buy this for pie. I eat very large salads and was looking for a shallow salad bowl. This is perfect. It seems a bit shallow to be a pie plate, but I generally make deep dish so that could be why. It serves my purpose beautifully though!
customer_reviews.author: Tab

customer_reviews.title: I used these for salad plates and such.
customer_reviews.text: These are great pie plates to use as serving plates for large salads and such. Also makes a great microwave heating up tool when I have Asian or Italian leftovers.
customer_reviews.author: M. D. Minuth

customer_reviews.title: I Love Corelle!
customer_reviews.text: I have a couple of these - great as a pie plate but also as a dinner/soup plate. It's really nice for large salads as the edge keeps everything on the plate. Easy to clean, hand wash or dishwasher safe - in the oven or microwave and it matches my white Corelle dishes. It's a keeper!
customer_reviews.author: C. Munoz

customer_reviews.title: 'Say goodbye to chips', my foot!
customer_reviews.text: I bought a set of 4 dishes. Upon arrival, one of the plates was totally broken in pieces which was stacked between 2 other intact plates! The outside packaging was undamaged. Disgusted.
customer_reviews.author: Krlaev

customer_reviews.title: Multi uses.
customer_reviews.text: Love these pie plates as dishes for the kids. The edges help prevent spillage and they are very tough.
customer_reviews.author: david jay

customer_reviews.title: Versatile Dishes
customer_reviews.text: I ordered 2 sets of these and I love them. They are some of my favorite dishes, because they can be used for so many different things.
customer_reviews.author: Karla Kay Denney

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: we use it as a plate so the food doesn't fall off
customer_reviews.author: mary gits

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Like all Corelle products, this is well-made. The sizing is correct, not too big like some of the other pie plates I looked at. The lip serves well to lift the plate and to anchor the crust and it's reasonably priced.
customer_reviews.author: Manfish

customer_reviews.title: Great look, great plates.
customer_reviews.text: Same as everyone, I use these as plates for salads and pasta. Fits in the dishwasher plate racks and nice clean look. Good for making omelets in the oven too.
customer_reviews.author: Niki the Amazon

customer_reviews.title: Great Pie Plate
customer_reviews.text: Very pretty. It is much lighter than Pyrex, and a bit larger and deeper also. It would also make an attractive serving dish. Or possibly individual pasta bowls.
customer_reviews.author: Harmon McCraw

customer_reviews.title: Beware of the description of what you are getting!
customer_reviews.text: I have several of these plates and really like them. However...there is a 9 in the description. I never would have paid this much just one of these plates! BUYER BEWARE!
customer_reviews.author: Ruth Mettler

customer_reviews.title: Broken upon delivery
customer_reviews.text: I received my set of 4 today and 1 is broken and 1 is chipped very disappointed I have these plates and was looking for more
customer_reviews.author: chrissy

customer_reviews.title: Not a deep dish pie plate, my fault for not reading more careful....
customer_reviews.text: Not a deep dish pie plate, my fault for not reading more careful....
customer_reviews.author: Sharon Perham

customer_reviews.title: Great diahes for salad or spaghetti
customer_reviews.text: Love these plates. I don't use as a pie plate but rather as a serving plate for large salads, spaghetti, and other like items.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Hlavacek

customer_reviews.title: I use crutches and I use these as my everyday ...
customer_reviews.text: I use crutches and I use these as my everyday plates. Nothing spills and they are easier to handle. Several of my friends have seen mine and have bought them for the same use.
customer_reviews.author: Auntie J

customer_reviews.title: Not fancy, not quite as deep as I'd hoped, but functional
customer_reviews.text: Reliable performance and easy cleanup, as with all Corelle products - and I'm sure it will last forever! However, not as deep as I'd hoped.
customer_reviews.author: IS

customer_reviews.title: Useful for more than pies!
customer_reviews.text: These pie plates make great soup bowls and casserole bowls.
customer_reviews.author: Rose

customer_reviews.title: These bowls wil break into thousands of pieces if hitting a sharp object
customer_reviews.text: Used for cereal or soup,also for meals that will easily slide off a flat plate.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Corelli lasts lasts forever
customer_reviews.text: Easy to clean and practical. Corelli lasts lasts forever. Great for small, pie for three. Can use as a roast plate for small portion
customer_reviews.author: Anne

customer_reviews.title: Great Plates
customer_reviews.text: Use these as salad plates. Don't break easy. Very easy to clean. I have 6 others so I added 4 more.
customer_reviews.author: William Brown

customer_reviews.title: Super
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these to replace a pie plate I had given to friends with a pie and never got the plate back. I loved the new ones even better than my old ones. They are lighter weight and work as well or better than the old ones I loved.
customer_reviews.author: Deana Burgardt

customer_reviews.title: Like this very much
customer_reviews.text: I saw other reviewers use this as a dinner plate...so I had to try it. Some days I'm bed-ridden (severe RA) so this made it easy to eat without spills. I'm on the Keto diet so most of my meals are: bacon, eggs, avocado for breakfast - dinners are usually a large salad with meat, avocado, a few veggies of choice and dressing, maybe add a slice of cheese to it. Not hungry much of the day so 2 meals works. Nothing spills or slides off. Easy to wash by hand.
customer_reviews.author: sailorTop Contributor: Coloring

customer_reviews.title: corelle plates
customer_reviews.text: i am very well pleased. the product and the service was excellent. i would highly recommend this company and their products.
customer_reviews.author: gary p gennardo

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: They are great for spaghetti or large salads. I use them everyday like plates.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: shattered
customer_reviews.text: bumped on kitchen counter,one shattered into a ga-zillion pieces be very careful many of the pieces were very sharp, OK
customer_reviews.author: Ed

customer_reviews.title: I hope they sell this forever
customer_reviews.text: My third one. I broke the one I had for twenty I broke my first one after more than twenty years, then I broke the next one. These are light, nothing stick, so many uses, great price and normally it would not break so easy, but I am a klutz.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa G

customer_reviews.title: Corelle  Thin & strong
customer_reviews.text: This plate is perfect for salads and soups. My husband and I are on a diet and we have a lot of salads and soups for dinner and is plate is perfect for this. I don't do a lot of baking
customer_reviews.author: Marcia Bouchell

customer_reviews.title: Prompt shipping, great wrapping.
customer_reviews.text: Book came within the day promised....loved it as I knew I would....Very happy with short delivery time and packaging.
customer_reviews.author: joanne

customer_reviews.title: I loved them. One wife and two kids later we ...
customer_reviews.text: I first bought these when I was a bachelor because that way I wouldn't need separate bowls and plates. I loved them. One wife and two kids later we all still love them. They are especially great for feeding kids because they help contain the disaster. My wife mentioned last what a good purchase these were, and now here I am on Amazon buying more.
customer_reviews.author: ttwillis

customer_reviews.title: Makes A Perfect Multi Dinner Dish
customer_reviews.text: I bought these 9 inch deep pie plates to use in place of dinner plates and they are perfect. I wanted a multi dish that could be used as a dinner plate or a large dinner salad plate and I've since found it's also perfect for soups, stews, casseroles, and pasta meals. One could easily use this as the perfect dish for all meals and the name speaks for itself as far as looks and quality. It's light weight and dishwasher safe. I would highly recommend this to everyone as the perfect multi dinner dish.
customer_reviews.author: Sue

customer_reviews.title: Corelle is awesome, love these pie plates.
customer_reviews.text: As always, Corelle is awesome. I love the size of these pie plates and the lip around the edge. I keep one in the microwave permanently just to microwave foods in, instead of using a paper towel. They can double as serving dishes too. I have dropped them on the floor and didn’t break, so very durable. I don’t always get dishes returned when I give a pie away.....so wanted to have extras on hand.
customer_reviews.author: Helpful Hannah

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Healthy Choice & Safe
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic. Use for our everyday dishes Not as a pie pan!!👌👍 I needed extra to add to my collection of Corelle winter white. got rid of all my different dishes and collections of China for the past 70 years and only using the Corelle winter white. There are so many carcinogenic possibilities of household items along with bacteria easy breakage.The tempered glass is similar to the process for a windshield. The fact that you can use the microwave for baking on Low temp in the oven is a plus too
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not just for pie
customer_reviews.text: I love these dishes I don't just use them for pie dishes I use them for every day dinner dishes that can hold spaghetti with a lot of sauce and foods that can usually be very messy and it can definitely hold a lot of chicken wings so if you're looking for a dish that can really hold your food and not just pie then this is it.
customer_reviews.author: Jade

customer_reviews.title: Great "meal" bowls!
customer_reviews.text: We got our first set 20+ years ago. When the second one fell on the tile floor it was time to buy another set. We still love them!
customer_reviews.author: Arpad

customer_reviews.title: My Favorite Plates
customer_reviews.text: These are great for everything! Labeled as pie plates, they are certainly good for that. Perfect for pasta and anything else you don't want to fall off the edge of your plate. Not indestructible, yet Very durable. If you have kids, you will love them. If you love spaghetti, you will love them.
customer_reviews.author: The King of Forever

customer_reviews.title: More than just an elegant pie plate
customer_reviews.text: These plares have such an elegant feel. Even though they are made as pie dishes I use them for so many other things: fruit dish, serving plate, supper plate (good for kids who would otherwise have food spill off a flat plate) and excellent for cooking microwave oatmeal (in a cereal bowl old fashioned oats boil over, but in this flat pie plate it's perfect microwave old fashioned oatmeal every time).
customer_reviews.author: detailer

customer_reviews.title: Good size
customer_reviews.text: I had two of these i bought at outlet in cabazon years ago. The store has been gone and was looking for them. Although it states that it’s for pies, i use it as dinner plate.
customer_reviews.author: Frankie

customer_reviews.title: Other usees
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for a lightweight, deep dish plate for sauce type dishes. Lasagna, spaghetti, other pastas, gravy’s, serving dishes for vegetables.
customer_reviews.author: Adela M. Howe

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: We love these, so easy to use. We typically don’t sit at our table so things don’t drop off or fall off.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sleek and Smooth
customer_reviews.text: I didn't Know Corelle made a glass pie plate! I tried it out and think it is great! light in weight yet strong. Distributes heat even and fast.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Corelle Livingware 9-Inch Deep Dish Pie Plate,...
customer_reviews.text: These light-weight plates work well for hubby and I when we decide to eat in front of the TV. He tends to tilt his plate slightly toward him and the rim of the plate prevents spillage.
customer_reviews.author: Damma

customer_reviews.title: Great dishes!
customer_reviews.text: My family uses these as dinner plates and they work to assist young ones in getting food onto their forks without the use of their fingers. That saves me from repeating myself at the dinner table...which makes everyone happy. YAY!
customer_reviews.author: Cha cha!

customer_reviews.title: classy and durable
customer_reviews.text: This is a perfect must-have dish for anyone who loves to bake. i use it for rolls, pies, chicken pot pies, rice casseroles, etc. looks very nice o the table, and cleans up beautiful. i always buy corelle because it is durable, can withstand high temperatures, and is lightweight. luv luv luv this product. you will not be disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: dbala966

customer_reviews.title: Corelle Livingware 9" Deep Dish Pie Plates
customer_reviews.text: these were exactly what we wanted and one package was great but the other one had one broken pie plate on the bottom, but it wasn't worth the effort to send the whole package of four just to get the full set of four
customer_reviews.author: Mike Loveall

customer_reviews.title: "NO PIES--BUT GREAT PARTY OR DINNER "PLATES!"
customer_reviews.text: "GREAT PLATE FOR SUPER BOWL PARTIES OR JUST MOVIES!" We use these all the time for supper bowl and watching movies or fill'em up for party food. With sides on your plate--no mess--goes right in the dishwasher for fast clean up too. Buy a couple, they'll become part of your kithen esscentails. CONNIE
customer_reviews.author: connie

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight, sturdy, easy to clean, pretty
customer_reviews.text: I love these. I bought several. My family perfers to use these as dinner plates because no spills.
customer_reviews.author: falalalala

customer_reviews.title: Great as a Dinner Plate
customer_reviews.text: I use these as a plate when I watch TV and eat! Great for keeping things in the plate when holding it on your lap!
customer_reviews.author: joel10000

customer_reviews.title: Great to use
customer_reviews.text: So nice to have another one of these plates. I have never used the plate for pie, but to help keep liquids from over running a typical dinner plate. the original plate I have came with a set 20 years ago! so they do last.
customer_reviews.author: Corkie

customer_reviews.title: Just what I wanted.
customer_reviews.text: Corelle is always very nice and these were no exception. They were packed well and shipped very quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon

customer_reviews.title: This product can be hard to find.
customer_reviews.text: This product can be hard to find. We use them in our regular dinnerware as soup bowls. I paid $17 for these two. We now have eight. I paid $10 each for the other six.
customer_reviews.author: Former Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Very light weight! Makes great Salad Plate-dish for taco salad and cobb salad etc... Great pasta dish. Great Pie plate. So many uses. Used daily. Microwave or bake in the oven.
customer_reviews.author: petrie

customer_reviews.title: Use as salad plates
customer_reviews.text: Often we eat salads as a meal and these lightweight pie plates are perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Diane Paulsen

customer_reviews.title: Perfect pie pan!
customer_reviews.text: We have Corelle everything, so this was an easy buy. I've been making summer pies and it cooks and cools in the fridge perfectly!
customer_reviews.author: Anna G.

customer_reviews.title: she loves these pie plates and they are very sturdy.
customer_reviews.text: My Mom has two handicapped clients that have trouble feeding themselves...with the edges of this pie plate, they are able to push the food to the edge and get it on their forks....she loves these pie plates and they are very sturdy.

customer_reviews.title: Corelli  Living ware 9 inches deep dish pie plate.
customer_reviews.text: A very nice standard pan. It is certainly not deep. I do not think it would pass for a pie plate versus a pie pan. The box labeled it as deep and plate.

customer_reviews.title: Great plate!
customer_reviews.text: I use this in my microwave convection oven and can use it with all settings. Cleans up easily and the size is perfect for lots of different baking. Highly recommended.

customer_reviews.text: Perfect for eating food (like spaghetti) which likes to move around on shallow plates.

customer_reviews.text: great dish that's a plate and bowl. Even an adult can appreciate their peas not falling off a plate.

customer_reviews.title: Like it
customer_reviews.text: good for taking meat out to the BBQ. I use two of them when I BBQ in the evening. Now.

customer_reviews.title: Class up your camping dishes
customer_reviews.text: These make great camp dishes, almost unbreakable, easy to wash, deep sides hold stew, etc., yet the bottom is flat enough for pancakes or steaks.

customer_reviews.title: The Great White Plate
customer_reviews.text: My family enjoys using these for our everyday dinner plates. The tall lip works well for keeping sauces, noodles and wandering peas on the dish - great for kids who need a little help with food that slides or spills. The dishes are also scratch resistant so they hold up very well.

customer_reviews.title: great dinner plate here, too
customer_reviews.text: Guess I'm not unique using this pie plate for a dinner plate and soup bowl. One feature worth mentioning is that it's light weight. A Pyrex pie plate is too heavy.

customer_reviews.title: This is a very shallow pie pan, despite the ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a very shallow pie pan, despite the description in the name - Corelle Livingware 9-Inch Deep Dish Pie Plate.

customer_reviews.title: the size is perfect for any meals with juices and also good to ...
customer_reviews.text: Even though it's a pie plate, the size is perfect for any meals with juices and also good to hold big salads. I love Corelle Livingware. They are so light weighted and strong!

customer_reviews.text: I thought this was supposed to be 'deep' dish pie pan ... It's no deeper than any normal pie pan. If you're thinking thick pies ... this isn't it !!
